import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{useParams,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import Carroussel from'../components/Carroussel';import Title from'../components/Title';import Host from'../components/Host';import Ratings from'../components/Ratings';import Tags from'../components/Tags';import Dropdown from'../components/Dropdown';import logements from'../assets/json/logements.json';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Logement(){var _useParams=useParams(),id=_useParams.id;var logement=logements.find(function(logement){return logement.id===id;});var navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(function(){if(!logement){console.log("la recherche de l'ID n'a pas abouti car logement est = "+logement);navigate("/404",{replace:true});// composant react-router useNavigate pour renvoyer automatiquement vers la page 404
}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carroussel,{pics:logement.pictures}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cntnr-title-location-tags-host-ratings",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cntr-title-location-tags",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Title,{className:"title",title:logement.title,location:logement.location}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cntnr-tags",children:logement.tags.map(function(tag){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tags,{tag:tag},tag);})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cntnr-host-ratings",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Host,{className:"host",host:logement.host}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Ratings,{className:"ratings",rating:logement.rating})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-flex",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dropdown,{title:"Description",titleClass:"logement-title",contentClass:"logement-content",children:logement.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dropdown,{title:"\xC9quipements",titleClass:"logement-title",contentClass:"logement-content",children:logement.equipments.map(function(line){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"",children:line},line);})})]})]});}export default Logement;
